name: poe-trading-utilities
description: - Checks the currency Exalt to Chaos ratio from [poe.ninja](poe.ninja) and given a decimal of an Exalt, reports back the equivalent Chaos value.   - to use:     1. Open the currencyConverter.AHK file in AutoHotKey     2. press the hotkey (default set to f4)     3. type in 1 to see the current exalt to chaos ratio OR type in the amount/remainder of exalt to see the chaos equivalent     4. press okay and see the equivalent amount of chaos
